NOTE: For practice the following lines are sung to the BONJQUR tune:
Cherchez la table
Touchez la table.
Mouvez la table.
Merci beaucoup.
Cherchez la chaise
Asseyez-vous.
Mouvez la chaise.
Merci beaucoup.
GAME: CHERCHEZ1
Use pictures on chart or cards. A point score may be kept, if desired,
over a period of time.
Leader (teacher or pupil) calls on pupil to point to correct pictures
as he commands:
Cherchez le crayon*
Cherchez le monsieur.
Cherchez Iâ€™ecole.
If pupil makes his 3 points, he in turn calls on another pupil and gives
3 commands.
